action.action-desc: Mr. Gallego (for himself and Mr. Byrne) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Rules, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the War Powers Resolution to transfer to the Committee on Armed Services of the House of Representatives the responsibilities assigned under such Resolution to the Committee on Foreign Affairs of the House of Representatives, and for other purposes.

section.header: Transferring Responsibilities under War Powers Resolution to House Committee on Armed Services

subsection.text: Section 5(a) of the War Powers Resolution (50 U.S.C. 1544(a)) is amended by striking Committee on Foreign Affairs of the House of Representatives and inserting Committee on Armed Services of the House of Representatives.

subsection.header: Procedure for consideration of joint resolutions or bills
subsection.text: Section 6(a) of the War Powers Resolution (50 U.S.C. 1545(a)) is amended by striking Committee on Foreign Affairs of the House of Representatives and inserting Committee on Armed Services of the House of Representatives.

subsection.header: Procedure for consideration of concurrent resolutions
subsection.text: Section 7(a) of the War Powers Resolution (50 U.S.C. 1546(a)) is amended by striking Committee on Foreign Affairs of the House of Representatives and inserting Committee on Armed Services of the House of Representatives.

section.header: Amending Rules of House of Representatives to transfer jurisdiction for bills, resolutions, and other matters relating to intervention abroad and declarations of war

subsection.header: Transfer to Committee on Armed Services
subsection.text: Clause 1(c) of rule X of the Rules of the House of Representatives is amended by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

rules-subparagraph.text: Intervention abroad and declarations of war.

subsection.text: Clause 1(i) of rule X of the Rules of the House of Representatives is amended by striking subparagraph (9) and redesignating the succeeding subparagraphs accordingly.
